p: Propolis is rich in flavonoids such as chrysin, pinocembrin, pinobanksin, apigenin, galangin, and quercin, and previous studies also showed that these compounds have excellent antitumor activities. Besides these, CAPE, one of the most important constituent of propolis, also has a strong antitumor activity. In all, these antitumor constituents in propolis account for the strong antitumor activities of propolis.
